family_office_profiles.name: DNS Capital
family_office_profiles.investment_focus: Venture capital, private equity, and investment management for the Pritzker family.
family_office_profiles.aum_evidence: The firm is associated with the Pritzker family, a well-known ultra-high-net-worth family, indicating substantial AUM.
family_office_profiles.investment_philosophy: Long-term and flexible approach to investing, focusing on building relationships with business owners, management teams, and entrepreneurs.

family_office_profiles.name: Promus Holdings
family_office_profiles.investment_focus: Private equity and venture capital investments.
family_office_profiles.aum_evidence: Involvement in large-scale investments suggests substantial wealth under management.
family_office_profiles.investment_philosophy: Helping families preserve and grow wealth through thoughtful investment strategies.

family_office_profiles.name: Henry Family Office
family_office_profiles.investment_focus: Strategic investments across various asset classes.
family_office_profiles.aum_evidence: Focus on meeting dynamic needs of family members suggests significant capital under management.
family_office_profiles.investment_philosophy: Strengthening family unity and providing a reliable system for preserving and growing generational wealth.

family_office_profiles.name: Cresset Capital
family_office_profiles.investment_focus: High-net-worth individuals and family office services.
family_office_profiles.aum_evidence: Cresset is known for catering to ultra-high-net-worth families, indicating substantial assets under management.
family_office_profiles.investment_philosophy: Cresset is a multi-family office that uses holistic wealth advisory practices.

family_office_profiles.aum_evidence: Bessemer Trust manages substantial assets for over 3,000 client relationships, indicating a very high AUM.

family_office_profiles.name: Gresham Partners
